title: Which is better in terms of placement

comments.body: Ec campus not good rather join EEE in main campus if you want only pes or else rvce eie is the way to go
Ohh okok i was also more inclined towards RVCE only but anyways thanks for the clarification

people here voted you straight to hell..

well since you had asked with respect to placements, PES was better.. only 50 got placed from EIE in RVCE.. you can access their placement status on their website

Yaa u r right but considering the avg placements of ei branch RVCE does better ,[RVCE placements ](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gEo3htMJjH8wvaNG7O3tng4VvsF-bF8d/view?usp=drivesdk)wait let me attach the file
